home.title: Welcome Home
home.textBody:
You've finally arrived at our homepage!

What have you been waiting for? Since you're here, let me show you what's this page all about. Yeah, you've read it correct, it's a page, not plural. This is a single-page application written in plain Javascript and rendered in your browser. Wonderful, right?

Meet Vanilla Javascript Router

Let me walk you through this web app.

Click on the link or use the navbar to check the About page or the Blog.

ENJOY!
